bibl.title: A Note on the New "Musenanruf" in Callimachus' Aetia.
bibl.note: In support of: Arnd Kerkhecker, Ein Musenanruf am Anfang der Aitia des Kallimachos, ZPE 71 (1988) pp. 16-24. The lemma in fr. 1a Pfeiffer, 19-23, fits neatly with the proposed invocation.
bibl.seg: Bing Peter, A Note on the New "Musenanruf" in Callimachus' Aetia.
In support of: Arnd Kerkhecker, Ein Musenanruf am Anfang der Aitia des Kallimachos, ZPE 71 (1988) pp. 16-24. The lemma in fr. 1a Pfeiffer, 19-23, fits neatly with the proposed invocation.
